details: Learn the fundamentals of C programming, including variables, loops, and functions.
An algorithm is a set of instructions designed to solve a problem or perform a specific task.
C++ is a powerful programming language that is commonly used in the field of Data Structures and Algorithms (DSA)..
Basic data structures are fundamental building blocks in computer science and programming.
In Python, object-oriented Programming (OOPs) is a programming paradigm that uses objects and classes in programming.
Software engineering is the systematic approach to the development, operation, and maintenance of software systems
Amazon Web Services (AWS) is a leading cloud computing platform offered by Amazon a wide range of on-demand computing resources and services over the internet.
MySQL is a popular open-source relational database management system that is widely used for web application
The Problem-Solving Part is a process of finding solutions to a particular problem or challenge
